sourcesContent:
<script setup>
import { listTags } from '@/api/tags'
import { ref } from 'vue'

const tags = ref([])

onMounted(() => {
    listTags().then(res => {
        tags.value = res.data
    })
})
onUnmounted(() => {
    tags.value = []
})
</script>

<template>
<el-card>
    <el-table :data="tags" style="width: 100%">
        <el-table-column prop="name" label="标签名称" />
        <el-table-column prop="description" label="描述" />
    </el-table>
</el-card>
</template>

<style scoped>


</style>
